name: Database Migration Validator
description: Validate database migrations when Flyway files are modified to prevent DB issues

actions.name: validate_migration_syntax
actions.command: echo 'üîç Validating migration syntax for ${SERVICE_NAME}...' && cd ${SERVICE_DIR} && mvn flyway:validate -q

actions.name: test_migration
actions.command: echo 'üß™ Testing migration on test database...' && cd ${SERVICE_DIR} && mvn flyway:migrate -Dspring.profiles.active=test -q
